actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-989.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 374 - 5 (Record Vote No: 486).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R.  6) to provide for the conservation and development of water and related resources and the improvement and rehabilitation of the nation's water resources infrastructure, and against the consideration of such conference report.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 6 (water resources development) and against its consideration.

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R.  6) to provide for the conservation and development of water and related resources and the improvement and rehabilitation of the nation's water resources infrastructure, and against the consideration of such conference report.
